languages.text: Зловещий старик из видения явил себя. Необходимо уничтожить мутанта и покончить со странным культом.
The sinister figure from the vision has revealed itself. The mutant must be destroyed and the strange cult eradicated.
languages.original_text: Зловещий старик из видения явил себя. Необходимо уничтожить мутанта и покончить со странным культом.

traits.locale_text: The sinister figure from the vision has revealed itself. The mutant must be destroyed and the strange cult eradicated.
The sinister figure from the vision has revealed itself. The mutant must be destroyed and the strange cult eradicated.

The sinister figure from the vision has revealed itself. The mutant must be destroyed and the strange cult eradicated.

languages.text: La sinistre silhouette de la vision s'est manifestée. Le mutant doit être détruit et son étrange culte éradiqué.
languages.original_text: The sinister figure from the vision has revealed itself. The mutant must be destroyed and the strange cult eradicated.

traits.locale_text: La sinistre silhouette de la vision s'est manifestée. Le mutant doit être détruit et son étrange culte éradiqué.

languages.text: La figura siniestra de la visión se ha mostrado. El mutante debe ser eliminado y el extraño culto erradicado.
languages.original_text: The sinister figure from the vision has revealed itself. The mutant must be destroyed and the strange cult eradicated.

traits.locale_text: La figura siniestra de la visión se ha mostrado. El mutante debe ser eliminado y el extraño culto erradicado.

languages.text: 你在幻象中看到的邪恶身影出现了。消灭这个变种人，铲除古怪的邪恶教派。
languages.original_text: The sinister figure from the vision has revealed itself. The mutant must be destroyed and the strange cult eradicated.

traits.locale_text: 你在幻象中看到的邪恶身影出现了。消灭这个变种人，铲除古怪的邪恶教派。

languages.text: 怪しい人影が、自ら姿を現した。変異体は退治し、妙なカルトは終わらせるべきだ。
languages.original_text: The sinister figure from the vision has revealed itself. The mutant must be destroyed and the strange cult eradicated.

traits.locale_text: 怪しい人影が、自ら姿を現した。変異体は退治し、妙なカルトは終わらせるべきだ。

languages.text: Die düstere Gestalt aus der Vision hat sich gezeigt. Der Mutant muss zerstört werden, der sonderbare Kult ausgelöscht.
languages.original_text: The sinister figure from the vision has revealed itself. The mutant must be destroyed and the strange cult eradicated.

traits.locale_text: Die düstere Gestalt aus der Vision hat sich gezeigt. Der Mutant muss zerstört werden, der sonderbare Kult ausgelöscht.

languages.text: Görüde yer alan uğursuz silüet kendini açığa çıkardı. Mutantın yok edilmesi, tuhaf tarikatın da kökünün kazınması gerek.
languages.original_text: The sinister figure from the vision has revealed itself. The mutant must be destroyed and the strange cult eradicated.
